chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Time to Be Gone
chapters.info: Noal Charin, p. 97 (103)—Man who saved Mat from a gholam in Ebou Dar by coming upon it and surprising it. He is stooped and white-haired, his nose crooked from breaking it. Most of his teeth are missing. He is quite likely Jain Charin, also known as Jain Farstrider.
